description:
Validate Email is a powerful API that validates single email addresses or bulk email addresses in seconds.

With our API, you can check if an email address has the correct syntax, gives friendly error messages when validation fails, checks deliverability, supports internationalized domain names, and normalizes email addresses. Our tool is simple to use and integrates seamlessly with your existing workflow.
